name: Recipe: Magmic Ode
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Magmic Ode.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Dish Effects</color>
Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by <color=#37ffff>10% â€“ 20%</color> for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
<color=#ffffff>Proficiency</color>
15
<color=#ffffff>Related Dishes</color>

customize.name: Magmic Ode
customize.desc: An ancient Natlan dish. Traditionally, the ingredients are wrapped in large leaves and steam-baked in a pit using red-hot stones. When billows of steam begin to rise like clouds, this Natlan delicacy, perfect for sharing with larger groups, is ready to serve.

customize.name: Delicious Magmic Ode
customize.desc: An ancient Natlan dish. The meticulous roasting locks the juices tightly within the ingredients, while a subtle smokiness lingers like faint golden threads sewn on rare woven scrolls, elevating the flaavor to new heights. A single bite will make anyone uncontrollably cheer in delight.

customize.name: Suspicious Magmic Ode
customize.desc:
An ancient Natlan dish. If there's still a hint of hope when the coarse, sandy texture touches your tongue, that last shred of optimism vanishes the moment the earthy taste hits your palate.

When exactly did it sneak its way in?

customize.name: Mavuika
customize.desc: The leader of Natlan who inherited the Ancient Name of "Kiongozi." She made a vow to illuminate the future of the nation of war with the Sacred Flame.

customize.name: Hymn of Gathered Flame
customize.desc: Mavuika's specialty. A variety of seafood, perfectly grilled, harmonizes into an exquisite symphony of flavor. It resembles an eternal, noble anthem ringing in your ears, with the unquenchable flames igniting in tandem. The stirring, beautiful melody carries an inspiring power. Is this perhaps also a part of the Pyro Archon's immense strength?

customize.name: Chanca
customize.desc: Owner of the Weary Inn and Zakan's Street Bites.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Magmic Ode
customize.desc: An ancient Natlan dish. Traditionally, the ingredients are wrapped in large leaves and steam-baked in a pit using red-hot stones. When billows of steam begin to rise like clouds, this Natlan delicacy, perfect for sharing with larger groups, is ready to serve.

customize.name: Grainfruit
customize.desc: This plant is named after the giant grains that grow along the cob.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

value.text: Purchase from Chanca at Zakan's Street Bites in Stadium of the Sacred Flame
